trans-unit.source: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA signature creation or verification operations.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填充模式和参数以使用与 RSA 签名创建或验证操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: The current instance and `obj` are equal if `obj` is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> instance and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property of the two objects is equal.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例和`obj`相等如果`obj`是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>实例和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A>是相等的两个对象的属性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象是否等于当前对象;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否等于指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The current instance and `other` are equal if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property of the two objects is equal.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例和`other`相等如果<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A>是相等的两个对象的属性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象是否等于当前对象;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此哈希代码<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此哈希代码<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the padding mode of this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取此的填充模式<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode (either <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref>) of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 填充模式 (任一<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref>或<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"> </xref>) 的此实例。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否两个指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The Equality method defines the operation of the equality operator for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values.
trans-unit.target: 相等性方法定义的相等运算符的运算<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>值。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property values are equal.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>值相等，如果其<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A>属性值是否相等。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否两个指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The Inequality method defines the operation of the inequality operator for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values.
trans-unit.target: 不等方法定义的操作的不等运算符<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>值。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values are unequal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property values are different.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>值是否不相等如果其<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A>属性值不相同。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are unequal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are unequal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that uses the PKCS #1 v1.5 padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取使用 PKCS #1 v1.5 填充模式的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that uses the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref> padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用的对象<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref>填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that uses PSS padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，使用 PSS 填充模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that uses the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref> padding mode with the number of salt bytes equal to the size of the hash.
trans-unit.target: 使用的对象<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref>的哈希大小相等的 salt 字节数的填充模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的字符串表示<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns the value of the `RSASignaturePadding.Mode.ToString` method.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法返回的值`RSASignaturePadding.Mode.ToString`方法。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的字符串表示形式。
